name: AllFacts
0:
”Alexa, ask All Facts to give me a fact”
”Alexa, tell All Facts to give me a Mind Blowing fact”
”Alexa, open All Facts and give me a fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: all facts
des: You can request all facts to give you a random fact or you can ask all facts to give you a fact from the categories as follows: fun, interesting, nutritional, funny, unbelievable, other, animal, weird, and mind blowing facts.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
